alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 10:37AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River below Wausau affecting Marathon County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wisconsin River below Wausau. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1167.0 feet, Water approaches buildings in DC Everest Park and Oak Island Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:10 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1167.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:10 AM CDT Wednesday was 1167.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1167.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1167.2 feet on 12/15/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
